meanings.definition: In accordance with or in compliance with
meanings.sent1: She acted pursuant to the rules of the game.
meanings.sent2: The project was completed pursuant to the client's requirements.
meanings.sent3: He danced pursuant to the rhythm of the music.
meanings.sent4: The flowers bloomed pursuant to the changing seasons.
meanings.sent5: The students followed the instructions pursuant to the teacher's guidance.

meanings.definition: Following or as a result of
meanings.sent1: The decision was made pursuant to the new information.
meanings.sent2: The celebration will take place pursuant to the parade.
meanings.sent3: The cat chased the mouse pursuant to its playful nature.
meanings.sent4: The waves crashed on the shore pursuant to the storm's intensity.
meanings.sent5: The crowd cheered pursuant to the team's victory.
